title: MTKN Myanmar
first_desc: MTKN Myanmar is a product display and inquiry website designed to showcase products and streamline customer inquiries.
second_desc: Key features include detailed product viewing, a blog section, a quotation form, a contact form, and an admin dashboard for efficient site management. Built using the TALL stack (TailwindCSS, AlpineJS, Livewire, Laravel), this project helped me deepen my expertise in these technologies. During production, I optimized the quotation form’s product selection and item selection on product detail pages by implementing AJAX requests to reduce delays. Although the fixes are not yet live, they are fully prepared for implementation when the production server allows.

title: MTKN Cambodia
first_desc: MTKN Cambodia is a custom WordPress website designed for product display and inquiry, with a smooth and user-friendly interface.
second_desc: It allows users to browse products, view detailed information, and select items to include in a personalized quotation form. The site also includes an accessible contact form and a blog section for regular updates. Additionally, the educational consultant service feature lets users explore MTKN Cambodia’s partnerships with schools, providing insights into joint activities and recent developments. This project showcases my expertise in creating tailored WordPress themes that blend functionality with a seamless user experience.

title: U digital Agency
first_desc: U Digital Agency (UDA) is a custom CMS project designed to showcase digital services in a streamlined and professional layout.
second_desc: Built using a custom WordPress theme, the site meets specific client requirements, featuring a comprehensive list of digital services with detailed information for each, a blog section for industry insights, a display of previous projects to highlight past successes, and a user-friendly contact form. This project demonstrates my ability to develop tailored CMS solutions that effectively present a client’s services and accomplishments.

title: Connect-4
first_desc: This Connect 4 Game is an interactive, strategy-based project developed with ReactJS, featuring a smart computer player to enhance the challenge.
second_desc: Built as a learning exercise, this project helped me deepen my understanding of React components, hooks, and game logic. It offers an engaging user experience while demonstrating my ability to create dynamic, responsive applications with React.

title: Travel and Tour Template
first_desc: This travel and tour website template is built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript, showcasing a modern design with a fully responsive layout optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop viewing.
second_desc: Designed to provide a seamless user experience across devices, this template highlights my ability to create visually appealing, adaptive layouts that suit a variety of screen sizes.

title: Portfolio Template
first_desc: This personal portfolio template, built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and jQuery, features a smooth and visually appealing design
second_desc: Responsive across all devices, it offers a clean layout that showcases personal or professional projects effectively. Creating this template reflects my passion for design and my commitment to building adaptable, user-friendly layouts.

title: Skater Blog Template
first_desc: The Skater Blog Template is my first website template, built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. Designed with a fully responsive layout, this template adapts seamlessly across devices, providing a smooth user experience.
second_desc: This project marks the beginning of my journey into web template design and showcases my foundational skills in creating structured and adaptable layouts.

title: Click a Dot Animation
first_desc: These JavaScript mini projects helped me build a strong foundation in JavaScript fundamentals.
second_desc: Each project—ranging from animations and interactive apps (like a quiz app, color generator, emoji switcher) to utilities (digital and analog clocks, unit converter, countdown timer)—allowed me to explore DOM manipulation, event handling, and responsive interactions. Through projects like the random password generator, live word counter, and toast alerts, I honed my problem-solving skills and gained hands-on experience in creating dynamic web features.
